oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The National Farm And Home Hour - Unknown Date - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of a broadcast of NBC program The National Farm And Home Hour, produced by the United States Department of Agriculture and NBC, sponsored by Allis-Chalmers, with Everett Mitchell (host), Herbert Lateau (director), Ken Gapin (reporter), and the Homesteaders (orchestra).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Homesteaders (orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Agriculture report (Ken Gapin) -- Musical interlude -- Everett Mitchell introduces the Homesteaders -- Parade Of The Wooden Soldiers (The Homesteaders) -- Everett Mitchell talks about soil builders -- Git Along, Little Dogies -- Everett Mitchell talks -- The Caissons Go Rolling Along -- Allis Chalmers commercial (Everett Mitchell) -- Closing statement (Everett Mitchell) -- Announcer closing statement -- NBC introduction
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; National farm and home hour (Radio program); United States. Department of Agriculture; Allis-Chalmers Company; Mitchell, Everett, 1898-
